title: Document Patient Elopement
description: An inpatient has left the unit without being discharged. A nurse must document this as an elopement.

tasks.description: Notify hospital security and the attending physician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse follows hospital protocol for a missing patient.

tasks.description: Locate the patient's record in the EHR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct inpatient encounter.

tasks.description: Process a 'Discharge - Left Against Medical Advice (AMA)' ADT message with a note indicating elopement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly updates the patient's status and documents the circumstances of the departure.
